page.title: 03Clubs in Ballantrae.
page.content: An excellent Community Centre,owned by the village and partly maintained by Strathclyde Regional Council,provides for indoor bowling,badminton,floor soccer,senior residents'club,senior and junior youth clubs,senior and junior drama groups,Scouts,Guides,Cubs Brownies,Beavers and Royal Observer Corps.All meet weekly.Pre-school play group meets twice weekly.A branch of SWRI,Church Women's Guild,WRVS,Tufty Club,male discussion group meet monthly.Licensed Masonic Lodge has social club.Art classes are held.An annual ball,discos,concerts,an annual flower show are successful.Bowling green,tennis courts,putting green, recreation park with children's play equipment,a small public garden and the beach are favourite places in summer.
